block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: espSnap URL - http://espsnap.local/ // espSnap library allows user to change the url - default is http://espsnap.local/ note : the custom block will add "/" at the back if missed by user
espSnap IP NULLit will reports the IP address of espSnap on successful connection otherwise, it will return blank (NULL)

url espSnap espSnapServer - true - false click on this to check for connection if this is a new connection, it will look for espSnap using the url and set the variable "espSnapServer" - return "true" if connection ok - return "false" if connection not ok
espSnapServer espSnap IP a variable espSnapServer is used to store the IP address of espSnap
espSnap IP connect to espSnap and show IP address if success
